abstract: Bloomberg administration issues report card showing energy consumption in city’s largest residential buildings, first time any American city has publicized such data; disclosure will be one of most prominent legacies of Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's environmental agenda.
lead_paragraph: The Bloomberg administration issued a report card showing consumption in the city’s largest residential buildings, the first time any American city publicized such data, environmental groups said.

headline.main: A Fresh Set of Grades Measures Energy Use in Residential Buildings
headline.print_headline: A Fresh Set of Grades Measures Energy Use In Residential Buildings

snippet: The Bloomberg administration issued a report card showing consumption in the city’s largest residential buildings, the first time any American city publicized such data, environmental groups said....
